mapper.insert: insert into inquiry(user_no, reported_user_no, title, content, type, phone, email, is_answered, reg_date, file) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{reported_user_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{is_answered}, #{reg_date}, #{file})
mapper.update: update inquiry SET answer_content=#{answer_content}, answer_date=#{answer_date}, is_answered=#{is_answered} WHERE inquiry_no=#{inquiry_no}
mapper.select: select * from inquiry WHERE user_no=#{user_no} AND inquiry_no < #{inquiry_no} AND reg_date <= #{reg_date} order by reg_date DESC, inquiry_no DESC LIMIT 10
